title: Should You Lie To Your Kids About Santa And The Tooth Fairy?
description: When it comes to characters like Santa Claus and the Tooth Fairy, parents often play along with elaborate charades. But what should grown-ups do when kids ask tough questions? (This episode originally ran in 2019.)
